Greetings to Singaporean President
    Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to S. R. Nathan, President of Singapore, on August 8 on the occasion of its national day.
 The message sincerely wished him success in his work for the building of a good society and prosperity.
